product_name: Dynafit TLT Radical ST Randonee Bindings with 110mm Brakes - 2013/2014
long_description: Light, strong and simple to use, Dynafit TLT Radical ST randonee bindings with 110mm brakes will get you deep into the backcountry where fresh tracks are yours for the taking. Aluminum toe plates feature side towers that align your boots with the binding pins to allow easy step-in entry. Length of the bindings can be adjusted plus or minus 12.5mm to fit a range of boot sizes. Climbing bars flip up and down, offering three heights for efficiency while touring; design eliminates the need to rotate heel pieces to adjust the climbing bar positions. Heel pieces are DIN adjustable (4 - 10) for forward and twisting falls. Gliding plates on the brakes allow good side release of the heels of the boots. Dynafit TLT Radical ST randonee bindings include 110mm-wide integrated ski brakes that fit most wide all-mountain skis.
short_description: Light, strong and simple to use, Dynafit TLT Radical ST randonee bindings with 110mm brakes will get you deep into the backcountry where fresh tracks are yours for the taking.
